title: Netflix adds new ‘Two Thumbs Up’ rating option to offer better recommendations
content:
Netflix is giving users yet another way to rate content, improving upon the existing “thumbs up” and “thumbs down” rating options. The company announced today that users will now be able to give a TV show or movie a “Two Thumbs Up” rating to indicate that “you love” what you just watched.

more…
